LUKE 9.45 iþ eis ni froþun þamma waurda, jah was gahuliþ faura im, ei ni froþeina imma;
jah ohtedun fraihnan ina bi þata waurd.
LUKE 9.46 galaiþ þan mitons in ins, þata ƕarjis þau ize maists wesi.
LUKE 9.47 iþ Iesus gasaiƕands þo miton hairtins ize, fairgreipands barn gasatida faura sis LUKE 9.48 jah qaþ du im:
saƕazuh saei andnimiþ þata barn ana namin meinamma, mik andnimiþ;
jah saƕazuh saei mik andnimiþ, andnimiþ þana sandjandan mik;
unte sa minnista wisands in allaim izwis, sa wairþiþ mikils.
LUKE 9.49 andhafjands þan Iohannes qaþ:
talzjand, gaseƕum sumana ana þeinamma namin usdreibandan unhulþons jah waridedun imma, unte ni laisteiþ miþ unsis.
LUKE 9.50 jah qaþ du im Iesus:
ni warjiþ, unte saei nist wiþra izwis, faur izwis ist.
niainshunaukistmannesaeinigawaurkjaimahtinnaminmeinamma
LUKE 9.51 warþ þan in þammei usfulnodedun dagos andanumtais is, jah is andwairþi seinata gatulgida du gaggan in Iairusalem.
LUKE 9.52 jah insandida airuns faura sis, jah gaggandans galiþun in haim Samareite, swe manwjan imma.
LUKE 9.53 jah ni andnemun ina, unte andwairþi is was gaggando du Iairusalem.
LUKE 9.54 gasaiƕandans þan siponjos is Iakobus jah Iohannes qeþun:
frauja, wileizu ei qiþaima, fon atgaggai us himina jah fraqimai im, swe jah Heleias gatawida?
LUKE 9.55 gawandjands þan gasok im jah qaþ du im:
niu wituþ ƕis ahmane sijuþ?
LUKE 9.56 unte sunus mans ni qam saiwalom qistjan, ak nasjan.
jah iddjedun in anþara haim.
LUKE 9.57 warþ þan gaggandam im in wiga qaþ sums du imma:
laistja þuk þisƕaduh þadei gaggis, frauja.
LUKE 9.58 jah qaþ du imma Iesus:
fauhons grobos aigun jah fuglos himinis sitlans;
iþ sunus mans ni habaiþ ƕar haubiþ galagjai.
LUKE 9.59 qaþ þan du anþaramma:
laistei mik;
iþ is qaþ:
frauja, uslaubei mis galeiþan faurþis jah usfilhan attan meinana.
LUKE 9.60 qaþ þan du imma Iesus:
let þans dauþans usfilhan seinans nawins:
iþ þu gagg jah gaspillo þiudangardja gudis.
LUKE 9.61 qaþ þan jah anþar:
laistja þuk, frauja;
iþ faurþis uslaubei mis andqiþan þaim þaiei sind in garda meinamma.
LUKE 9.62 qaþ þan du imma Iesus:
ni manna uslagjands handu seina ana hohan jah saiƕands aftra, gatils ist in þiudangardja gudis.
LUKE 10.1 Afar-uþ-þan þata ustaiknida frauja jah anþarans sibuntehund jah insandida ins twans ƕanzuh faura andwairþja seinamma in all baurge jah stade, þadei munaida is gaggan.
LUKE 10.2 qaþuh þan du im:
asans managa, iþ waurstwjans fawai;
bidjiþ nu fraujan asanais ei ussatjai waurstwjans in þo asan seina.
LUKE 10.3 gaggiþ,
sai ik insandja izwis swe lamba in midumai wulfe.
LUKE 10.4 ni bairaiþ pugg nih matibalg nih gaskohi;
ni mannanhun bi wig goljaiþ.
LUKE 10.5 in þane gardei inngaggaiþ, frumist qiþaiþ:
gawairþi þamma garda.
LUKE 10.6 jah jabai sijai jainar sunus gawairþjis, gaƕeilaiþ sik ana imma gawairþi izwar;
iþ jabai ni, du izwis gawandjai.
LUKE 10.7 inuh þan þamma garda wisaiþ matjandans jah driggkandans þo at im;
wairþs auk ist waurstwja mizdons seinaizos.
ni faraiþ us garda in gard.
LUKE 10.8 jah in þoei baurge gaggaiþ jah andnimaina izwis, matjaiþ þata faurlagido izwis.
LUKE 10.9 jah lekinoþ þans in izai siukans jah qiþiþ du im:
atneƕida ana izwis þiudangardi gudis.
LUKE 10.10 iþ in þoei baurge inngaggaiþ jah ni andnimaina izwis, usgaggandans ana fauradaurja izos qiþaiþ:
LUKE 10.11 jah stubju þana gahaftnandan unsis us þizai baurg izwarai ana fotuns unsarans afhrisjam izwis;
sweþauh þata witeiþ þatei atneƕida sik ana izwis þiudangardi gudis.
LUKE 10.12 qiþa izwis þatei Saudaumjam in jainamma daga sutizo wairþiþ þau þizai baurg jainai.
LUKE 10.13 wai þus Kaurazein, wai þus Baiþsaïdan!
